function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of reported thermal energy storage (TES)","Impact":"Inefficient heating and ventilation system could lead to poor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Install thermal energy storage to improve heating efficiency and air quality.","Technologies":"Thermal energy storage systems, smart HVAC controls.","People":"Building occupants, healthcare staff, patients.","Owner":"Building management, maintenance team."},{"Description":"Less than 50% of relevant heating loads are metered","Impact":"Inability to accurately measure heating system performance and identify inefficiencies, leading to potential health risks from poor indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Implement metering for accurate measurement of heating loads and performance.","Technologies":"Energy metering systems, IoT sensors.","People":"Building management, maintenance team.","Owner":"Facility management, energy management team."},{"Description":"No reporting on domestic hot water usage","Impact":"Inability to monitor and optimize domestic hot water usage, potential for waterborne disease transmission and inefficient water usage.","Mitigation":"Implement monitoring and reporting system for domestic hot water usage.","Technologies":"Smart water metering, IoT sensors for water usage monitoring.","People":"Building occupants, healthcare staff, patients.","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance team."}]}
